message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,500,000. What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product significantly surpasses that figure. I'm willing to move down to $1,300,000. This reflects the true worth of what this product can deliver.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still seeking a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,150,000. I hope this suggestion will be more within your consideration.
